summary: The Lexus LS is a line of fancy, full-size cars that have been Lexus' top model since 1989. Early models had V8 engines and were mostly rear-wheel drive. Later, they added all-wheel drive, hybrids, and longer wheelbases. The fifth generation switched to a V6 engine. The first LS 400 was made in 1989, and each generation has been built in Tahara, Japan. The LS was designed to compete with luxury brands like Mercedes-Benz and BMW. It was so popular that it helped make Lexus a successful brand worldwide.
title: Lexus LS
